text: Gabriel Serbian was an American drummer, guitarist and vocalist. He became famous for his work in The Locust, Cattle Decapitation, Holy Molar and Zu. He was also a member of Head Wound City, a hardcore/punk rock supergroup.Gabe Serbian"Mark of the Beat," Revolver: The Book of Slayer Special, November 2009, p. 54. Serbian died on April 30, 2022, the day before his 45th birthday.RIP Locust innovator Gabe Serbian == References == Category:1977 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American drummers
title: Gabe Serbian
